name: Flowerize
description:
Flowerize

Use a/d to move, space to jump, shift/s to burrow, left click to attack.

Turning into a seed (burrowing) you can move in the ground, use it!

This is not the final version, but we didn't have time to push things a little.

Made by a team of two people for the Kenney Jam 2022.

GitHub

Gamedesign, art and music: Camellia

Programming and gamedesign: och

Assets: Kenney

It's 1-Bit Platformer Pack but colored with Apollo palette, and the player sprite is composed (and ship-of-theseus'ed) from grass and flowers ;3;

*wow i uploaded this in less than 10 seconds before the submission deadline*
